content: सुषम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Very lovely or beautiful, very pleasing. {@--2@} Same; all. --मा Exquisite beauty, great lustre or splendour; कुरबककुसुमं चपलासुषमं <ls>Gīt. 7</ls>; सुषमाविषये परक्षिणे निखिलं पद्ममभाजि तन्मुखात् <ls>N. 2. 37</ls>, <ls>Bv. 1 26</ls>, <ls n="Bv.">2. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 2.">74</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 2.">82</ls>, <ls n="Bv.">3. 7.</ls>
